website_summaries.verdict: The USB-C cable pack of choice for anyone wanting some variety in length. Comes in lengths of 1, 4, and 6 ft.
pros: Multiple length cables means you can mix and match the set for a variety of different desktop, laptop, and tablet setups
Braided cord construction protects cables from extreme abuse
cons: The 1 ft. cord may be too short for everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Great Products, OEM Quality
customer_reviews.text: These cables are awesome, especially considering the price. I gave 2 to my coworker and she loved them too. They plug in perfectly to my One Plus 3t and my coworker's Google Pixel. My coworker loves the 1' one because it's perfect for her car. I prefer the longer ones because I can fit them behind my desk and down to my old Samsung block that I have plugged into the wall. I've had the same one at my desk for almost a year now and it works perfectly everytime, just like my OEM cable at home.
customer_reviews.author: daysleeper

customer_reviews.title: USB 2.0 ONLY. Otherwise, quite good!
customer_reviews.text: ONLY WORKS AT USB 2.0 SPEED. Don't buy if you need to do anything other than charge your phone with this. EDIT: Just got an email from the seller. Offered a refund, but is claiming that the USB 2.0 standard is 10 GB/s. Seems nice enough, but is clearly misinformed, so this review stays up until they change the bullet points in the item description. EDIT 2: Seller changed the description and was very proactive and kind about it. The cables are really extremely nice, and if they worked for what I need them for I would be thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Flapjacks

customer_reviews.title: Versatility, quality, price - can't beat this deal
customer_reviews.text: These cables are high quality and work well for my needs, which are just for charging my family's new USB-C equipped phones. They support Motorola's TurboPower charging mode, evidenced by the message that pops up on my phone when I used these cables with my Motorola TurboPower chargers. The variety of lengths is nice as well, as they can be used around my house and in my car for a variety of different charging applications. With a good price, fast delivery, and high quality, I think this makes this item a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement cables for my Samsung Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: These cables are of very high quality, and looks like they will last a long time. I use them with the fast charging adapter that came with my Samsung Galaxy S8 and it works perfectly. If you need replacement cables or extra for office and other places you have a need for a cable you can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Rodnoi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal and the cables feel like high quality materials ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal and the cables feel like high quality materials were used to make them. Each cable has its own rubber organizer, which allows you to easily store the cable neatly. Bonus is that you also get a really cool bag to put all the cables in on your family trips.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Zaklis

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. All 4 items attached well to my Android phone with a satisfying and solid 'click'. Both sides charged with no problem at all. Very well packaged with ziplock style bags and a fabric carry bag. All in all, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hacked Account

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality cables. The metal around the connector, the braided sleeve over the wires and the high quality pouch they come in. Very surprised for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Note 8. Cord is durable and these serve their purpose especially the smaller cord that I use with my power bank when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Angela N

customer_reviews.title: S'all good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at great price, my kids take em from me, so I ordered them twice. Didn't mean to rhyme, ugh happens sometimes...oops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cables, and perfect assortment of sizes
customer_reviews.text: The cables feel sturdy and look great. I like the pouch and the built in elastic band works great for storage. The assortment of sizes is great and it's cheaper than other cables. I also like the satisfaction guarantee, not that I have had to use out, but it's nice to know. Over all great cables.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine what could be improved...
customer_reviews.text: From the design of the actual cables to the foresight in useabily and packaging, these are superior to any cellphone data cable I've previously purchased. They came packed in a small cloth bag of a quality that it be useful for years. It will keep them tidy and dust-free for a good long while. Each cord has its own cable control device built onto it to keep it tidy. The cable sheath is a very flexible polymer braid but doesn't stretch noticeably... perfect. the connectors are robusu
customer_reviews.author: AbleTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!  Will definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great product made extremely well. Comes in a great storage bag and each individual cable has a rubber loop that keeps the cables wrapped up when not in use. Most importantly each wire is covered with a very impressive looking braided fabric and the connection ends have tough metal casings to protect the wires and the plugs. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a quality cable.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Good at first
customer_reviews.text: They held up physically, look real sturdy, but slowly one by one they have been losing their ability to fast charge. And they're not even regular charging right, they turn to slow charge. I mean I sleep seven hours and it takes six hours to slow charge. Oh take that back about sturdy, one only works if you find the sweet spot on the wire part.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome high quality in buckeye's colors
customer_reviews.text: Red metal ends to easily separate from older sub cables. High quality braided fabric is better looking than plastic and nicely flexible. The included silicone ring keeps them folded up, but didn't work that well (too grippy) Bonus for OSU fans: it's very scarlet and gray. Not my colors, but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome, particularly with aluminum fittings and black plastic strain relief. They perform as expected and I have had no issues. I expect them to have a very long lifespan as they seem extremely well built. Attached rubber band is a bonus, as well.
customer_reviews.author: bcrgus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cables. They feel like they're made of very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cables. They feel like they're made of very durable materials. The variety of lengths is very handy, I don't always need the really long one. They seem to handle quick charging just fine. And they answer emails and questions you may have fairly quickly. Will definitely be looking for more products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality set of type C cables.  Great quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This package of 4 type C USB Cable is an incredible deal for several reasons: 1 The quality of the cables is excellent. The cables are reinforced and better quality than other braided cables I bought in the past. 2 They work wonderfully and charge well. 3 The price is so reasonable for four cables. Recently I purchased one type C cable in a local store and paid 20.00 for one cable and it was just so so quality. 4 The seller of these cables sent his business card with info and a guarantee. 5 The cables came in a drawstring cloth storage bag. I highly recommend these cables.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy STop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great / BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel awesome! Sadly they don't last...I bought these 2 months ago 1/28/18 and everyone quit working except the little one. One quit completely and two quit fast charging (LG V30 / Samsung S9+)
customer_reviews.author: Sir Thomas

customer_reviews.title: They Simply Do Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The product looked nice and felt nice in the hand, like it was made with high quality. Everything was fine except for one small detail. The product did not work. I ordered two packs of these for my new Motorola phone. The cables do not fully snap into place in the phone and just hang loosly about 2/3 the way in. They easily fall out. They never plug in far enough to charge the phone. Two packs amounts to 8 cables. i tried all 8 and all of them had the same defect. I am returning for a refund. It's a shame. I really wanted them to work, because they looked and felt so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tate West

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this set, but it was a waste
customer_reviews.text: The 1 foot cord is completely useless as it is too short to be used for anything, it's even too short to be used as a vehicle charger! One of the 4 foot cords was bent upon arrival, thus not working at all. The other 2 other cords stopped working within 2-3 months of purchase. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Look  sturdy but fail quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these, but 3 of the 4 have failed. All look to be in perfect condition and have been babied, but simply quit working. UPDATE: after my review, they replaced the complete set, so I must give them an "A" for customer service. I've also added another star. It remains to be seen if these hold up any better. If they do, I will revise my review again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. White

customer_reviews.title: The cables look really nice! Unfortunately that is about the only good thing ...
customer_reviews.text: The cables look really nice! Unfortunately that is about the only good thing about them. They do not quick charge, heck they do not even charge my HTC u11 life phone. I use my original cable and a charger and it works just fine. Using the exact same charger, I have plugged in 3 different cables and none of them charge the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Charges too slowly
customer_reviews.text: I was charging my phone in the car while trying to use Maps, and a message popped up that the phone was not charging fast enough to compensate for the app use.
customer_reviews.author: OpinionatedLady

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality
customer_reviews.text: Barely 6 months later, one of these cables has completely stopped working (subjected to the least amount of wear-and-tear conceivable). Do not buy these cables. UPDATE: now only another 2-3 months later, another cable has stopped working (you can tell the wiring inside is faulty...if you press/twist is just right, the device will connect fora second). That's 2 of 4 cables in the trash in less than a year. Absolutely garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Only 1/4 charges, but not quick charge for S8
customer_reviews.text: Only one out of four of these connects to my Samsung Galaxy S8, and that one doesn't even quick charge. Tested on other devices to make sure, but same result. Definitely beware of duds. Will be returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Working well, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say the packaging, presentation and fit and finish of the cords is outstanding for the price. And while I did have some issues with my first set, the company has awesome customer service and wanted to make sure I was happy. The second set did provide fast charging for my S8+. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 of these work
customer_reviews.text: Thought this set was perfect, for house, car, work. Except only two of them actually work. The other two don't charge. So just be aware, you're really only getting half of what you pay for. Update: the other two stopped working as well. Customer service is equally abysmal, as they kept promising both a refund and a replacement, and managed to follow through with neither. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I was cotacted by customer service and they sent me replacement cords. they were very nice and helpful. I have changed my review to 4 stars and I hope these cords last longer then the original ones. I purchased these for my wife 6 months ago and one 1 still works.... out of the 4! When they worked they were perfect and she loved them but it's a shame that they really didn't last at all.
customer_reviews.author: VALuableAdvice

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that I really needed several lengths. But I had lost one of my employer's cables, and it just made sense for the price to by this pack, replace the one I lost and have a few extra. I use them all of the time in different settings. The shortest is perfect for charging from my Pixel on my Mophie battery while securely in my purse. The long one is ideal for interfacing my Oculus Quest VR headset with my PC. Others reach over the couch just so, for various applications. These are very well made. And a steal at the price. The bag even makes them easy to keep track of. You wont regret purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jump

customer_reviews.title: Started to only "slow charge" after days of use on my Essential phone.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: The customer service was very responsive and I likely received a defective pair. COVEY made it right - updated to 3 stars for their excellent customer service. Love the look and feel, but sadly they all started to only slow charge on my Essential. First the 6 rooter, then the 4 footer. The shorty still works in my truck. At slow charging my phone can take up to 20 hours to charge LOL. Unfortunately I have to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality...great value
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than current cords of a similar type from a different vendor. They're very flexible and soft. I know that doesn't make sense, but they're not stiff. I love having one long length cord for near the bed, two medium length cords for the car or the kitchen, and a very short one for my backpack. They work extremely well with my phone which takes a turbocharge, and I have zero complaints whatsoever. I'd happily purchase another set at this price! Great value! They also came with a little carrying case which I haven't had before with other cord purchases. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: None of the four works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these cables a few weeks ago but never put them to use until today, 12/13/19. I plugged one into a power brick and the USB-C into a 2018 iPad Pro. No indication of charging on the iPad. Installed a tester between the power source and the iPad. Tester registered 5V; no indication on the iPad. Performed the same test on all four cables with the same results. Then I used a different manufacturer’s cable which worked nicely. I assess that I cannot recommend this product and I will be pursuing a return/refund. It’s too bad; I liked the different lengths and really wanted them to work. Nd
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Got me some cables!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The 6 ft cable helps with the 'range' on the bed. The 1ft is for working on the desktop and the two 4 ft cables (tested) haven't been used as yet. If all the checks on Amazon these were the most reasonable priced for prime delivery. It was surprising that they came with attached rubber retainers for securing in the wrapped up position. A sturdy and well made pouch was included for travel. The cables 'snap' in nicely and are well made. Would definitely update on how long they last but I suppose with moderate use these would last a while. No issues with charging or data transfer. This was a good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: DelKar

customer_reviews.title: Bought another one, that's how much we like them!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a real stickler for phone cords. I actually have a inline amp meter that I use to measure how good a charge cord is at providing current to my phone. Samsung cords are the gold standard. I've had so many crap cords over the years - you know the ones that somehow it takes like 8 hours to charge your phone. When I put the meter on these cords they preformed just like a Samsung cord! Cha-ching! The length selection is really nice to. The long one works great by the bed side and the other come in handy for different situations. They have been to Europe and back and have help up very well. Can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: r570sv

customer_reviews.title: They make it right if you get bad ones!
customer_reviews.text: Two of these are already broken and the 1 foot one is literally useless even in a car. They worked okay for a couple weeks but after that they fell apart. UPDATE: they reached out to me and replaced the cables so that is awesome! We will see if these work out.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P.

customer_reviews.title: Low Price but Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new phone that has a USB Type C female data and charging connection. The new phone came with one cable and I wanted to have several cables in various locations (car, bedroom, backpack, desk) rather than trying to keep just the one cable with me at all times. They are all USB Type A Male X USB Type C Male cables. They come in three different lengths and a handy drawstring bag in included. The outer cover of the cables are braided which I think adds to their strength and flexibility. I highly recommend these cables.
customer_reviews.author: penrod

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product, but they look nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is really unfortunate because the cables appear to be very well constructed and look nice. Even the included packaging was pretty good. Like some of the other recent reviewers stated, they do not work as they are supposed to. The C-side of the cable (metal housing) is too long and doesn't make a good connection with the Galaxy S8+. At first I thought the cables did not work at all, but after trying to force them in farther I was able to get them to charge, however, it only a slow charge. Basically useless as they can't charge my phone completely over the course of 7 or 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Zero

customer_reviews.title: Update: Fast charging capability short lived
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6 months ago. 2 out of the 4 cords no longer fast charge. They are actuality now 'slow charging' at indicated by the phone. Plug being used is a fast charge and when I swap i cord out with another, it fast charges. Cord look to be in great condition so unsure what the issue. One used in car, the other used bedside. Update: updating stars from 1 to 5 for excellent customer service. Merchant reached out, apologized, and offered a replacement or a full refund. I chose new cables as these are nice looking cords and cannot be confused with the other types of phone cords which are typically black/white
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Defective Cable
customer_reviews.text: I received this around Dec.7th, Tested all the cables. They all worked. I have only used the long one and it failed after 6 weeks. I am always careful to pull the end out of my iPad Pro using the Red end NOT by pulling the cable itself. I am really disappointed as they are extremely well made. The end snaps in to their receptive outlets and that I love. Hopefully, the company will send me another set to try. My understanding they are still under their 18 month warranty. If they do, I will revise my Rating to 5 Stars, if they last the full warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: RBR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love the variety in lengths
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new phone that required USB-C cables as opposed to all of the micro USB cords I have hanging around my house. I like these as they are much more rugged than the one supplied by the manufacturer. They variety in lengths is useful if you need that. I have my phone mounted close to my truck's 12-volt USB port and the smaller 1 foot cord is great for my setup. I don't like to have a lot of cords hanging all over my truck's dash and console so this cord is perfect for that. I was very surprised at the quality of these cables for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect variety of lengths, fast charging, and durable
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but a single charging cord is never enough! I want one for work, one for my bedroom, one for my living room, one for my car, one for travel...you get the idea. I use a long cord in my living room, a shorter one in the car, a really short one for my pack. With a new phone, I needed newer cords. These have held up well to all of my abuse and work with the rapid charging. The cords don't fray or crack. The red color stands out from all the black and white charging cords, so there's no doubt it's mine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: No longer fast charging
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months the cords no longer are "fast charging" ... when I plug them up my phone pops up a message that I've attached a SLOW CHARGING CABLE .... I check & make sure everything is plugged up correctly & still have this problem! This is the 2nd time I've bought these & it's happened....will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Md4Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not for Note 8
customer_reviews.text: None of these cords will work on the Note 8. It's a joke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great deal at all
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of person that buys things on internet and reads the reviews and follow the stars as a guide in order to get a good product, but in this case the recommendations and 4.5 stars did not work at all. Only 1 of the 4 cables works properly. 3 of them do not charge my new Samsung 8+. I took them to a cellphone technical service and they verified that only 1 of them is working and the other 3 do not transfer energy as they should. Sorry guys, that is the truth, they look nice, great texture, but they do not perform their job.
customer_reviews.author: andres vera hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Good retroactive customer service
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 4 cords have stopped working after just 10 weeks of occasional use. 1 in car, 1 at desk, 1 at house. Very disappointed. Will stick with Anker. Update: the company contact me about my review and offered to replace the cables or give me a refund. I told her replacement cables in order to give them another shot and so far these are working fantastic we I hope that cover E has gotten there kinks worked out and that these cables continue to do that job. thank you for looking out for your customers and paying attention to our reviews covery.
customer_reviews.author: S. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: What Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I tried to email Covery Authorized directly through Amazon but Amazon rejected my message claiming that my order number was not with Covery Authorized. So I am forced to write this review to get their attention. One cable from the 4-pack has failed. There is no obvious sign of distress but it no longer charges either my wife's or my cell phones. I would have preferred to keep this quiet but given that Amazon claims I didn't buy from Covery Authorized and there is no link to their Warranty Service, I'm forced to communicate like this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Balaban

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: As far as USB cables go these do what they should. Nothing to count off for anyway. Where I have an issue is using the 1 foot cable plugged into the Ford Sync in my truck. Android Auto opens, works for a while but almost always crashes minutes later and it only does that with this cable. I'm pretty certain its a connection issue right at the phone end because a bump in the road really seems to set it off. I guess some things can't be avoided but it doesn't happen on other USB C cables so, it's worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: The Best Quality Made USB C Cables
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough on how glad I am to finally have found a USB C Cables that does what it is suppose to do , and is made of great quality material, and the wiring doesnt break when cable gets bent. Love that each Cable has an attached band to help with storage and minimizing length of cables, and make it easier when traveling. I have been using these to charge my phone and am amazed as to how quickly I can charge my phone even with a dead battery. I Do Highly Recommend Buying this Product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessiefinch99

customer_reviews.title: they could have fixed it easily by just taking my address and sending a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this package and immediately it came with one that would not even charge... Slowly over the course of a few months they all quit fast charging... and currently only 1 actually charges. They apologized and gave me a code to redeem a pack for free but it didn't work. I then went through hoop after hoop after hoop trying to get replacements. Every time they gave me a code to enter that did not work, they then blamed it on amazon and I never ended up getting replacements.. they could have fixed it easily by just taking my address and sending a new pack out...Don't buy these cords, they are not work it...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fleenor

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly amazing quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly impressed by the quality of these cables. I got a phone that had a USB-C port for charging, so I was looking for something cheap to get so I could charge my phone at work, if I needed it. These seemed like a good price, and came in a variety of lengths, which is handy to avoid desk clutter. When the cables got here, I was surprised. They're cloth wrapped, come in a nice carry case, and look great. Each cable also has a little rubber tie attached to keep the cable tidy if it's not being used or if there's too much and you need to fold up extra length.
customer_reviews.author: I. Roddis

customer_reviews.title: bad quality cables...spend a little more money to get something with more quality.
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought that this was a steal being able to buy a 4-pack of USB-C cables for a competitive price. But, as i have heard time and time again, you get what you pay for. I got the cables in Feb 2018, and they worked fine for a good while, but in the last month, 2 of my cables have died and will not charge my phone. I wont be buying these anymore. i really wish i could get my money back. It is poor construction of the actual cable and it is terrible that after only 4-6 months of use their are significant issues with the cable properly working.
customer_reviews.author: finonfire

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded from the Samsung galaxy s7 to the s10 so other than the charger or came with I didn't have any extra cables. I bought this pack and the cables are great. I use the 1ft with my portable battery charger. One of the 4ft cables is plugged into my quick charger next to my bed. The 6ft cable is by the couch so that no matter how I sit on the couch I can always use chromecast through my phone. I can't speak on the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Loribelle

customer_reviews.title: Good cables, good length, and a secure connection to the charge port on my phone
customer_reviews.text: Edited my review -- i have had two of these fail. The most recent shorted out. Just through normal use. They look beefy, but they really aren't better than ones withuot the braided cord cover. They seem well built. All of them work. I'm using and S8 at the moment, and the connector takes a definite push to click into place and a pull to extract, which is good as I intend these as charging cables for the car, the desk, etc. The selection of lengths is perfect for that purpose. I use the shorty on my desk to connect to the USB hub, and the longer ones elsewhere as charging cables. These are good for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a few months after I bought them
customer_reviews.text: They work well for awhile, but the wires inside started to go bad a few months after I purchased them. My phone used to charge at a normal rate when I first got the cords, but now whenever I use one of these cords my phone notifies me that it's charging very slowly (Not at all if I'm using it while it's plugged in). I have tried different outlets and it's all the same. I guess it's okay for what you are paying for them, though, but don't expect to be using them for more than 6-8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't encounter any issues, but now every time I plug my phone in using these cables I get a message saying "Slow charging. Make sure charger is properly connected. Use charger that came with device." Most times it will slow charge which is not a huge deal, but sometimes it will not charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as OE cord, and one for every need!
customer_reviews.text: Seems the new phones need a USB-C cable. Rather than haul one cord everywhere I go, had to buy some, one for each vehicle, plus a spare just in case. This multi pack fits the bill, little short one for the house, 2 longer for the vehicles, and the 6 ft for when I need to stay plugged in, like when I'm gaming, Cord that came with my phone is my spare. These charge just as fast as the cord that came with my phone and the lighter color makes them easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: Oldhide

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case!
customer_reviews.text: The great thing about these cables is the variety of lengths. One thing I hate is dealing with cables that are too long - cable management is always a priority with me. What I loved about these cables was that each one had it's own rubber tie on it. It allowed me to make little bundles for each one such as attaching it to an External Enclosure or pair it with Bluetooth Earpieces. Each cable picked up and transferred data super fast, I bought everything together and so far I have been playing games on Mac and BootCamp without any issues whatsoever. Very happy, these are a great stocking stuffer for that tech in your family!
customer_reviews.author: Kinetic Web Design

customer_reviews.title: They do the job with some nice added touches
customer_reviews.text: Not a whole lot you can write about charge cables. Either they work or they don't. Either you can synchronize through them or you can't. These cables worked perfectly on both counts. Still, there were added touches that make these stand out. They shipped with reusable rubber loops that keep the cords tidy when not in use or when you don't need their full length. A small cloth bag is included for storage. I also found the 1-for length tremendously convenient for charging while at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Number 6

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact set in Nov 2017 for a member of my family. Was very impressed. Now I needed another set as we got more gadgets with usb c, and I did look around for a bit to see the options. There are a lot of choices. But, I came back to this set again. Price is right. The cords in the set basically cover all my needs, including home, work, car and travel. Comes with a little traveling pouch. The quality is also very obvious with this one, complete with all metal connectors. None of the cords from my first purchase show any sign of wear. This is a solid choice. Already recommended to some of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great cord set!
customer_reviews.text: These cords feel like they're great quality, and have performed like it as well! The plug bodies (the red part) are actually aluminum, and have some weight to them. They also work with my rapid charger! The included rubber band is super helpful when packing the cords up, although I do not know how long it will last with heavy use. The cord feels well made and I have had no issues with the cords I have used so far (all but one of the 4'). I would definitely buy these again so far!
customer_reviews.author: Red S.

customer_reviews.title: read update - STILL ZERO STARS - Does not quick charge, not even blue tip
customer_reviews.text: only 5 stars because they refunded (albeit not legitimately), product is still 1 star Original Review: Cheap material, doesn't quick charge as indicated not def not 3.0 Updated Review: After 5 months they emailed me directly to offer to refund or replace (pretty sure that's not allowed - contacting outside of amazon is a no-no). I agreed and heard nothing. After 7 months they emailed me the same thing from a different email address and I told them that they offered and never did. When I provided the information - they said they couldn't find my order, but still gave me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: B. Song

customer_reviews.title: variety is the spice of life
customer_reviews.text: sometimes you need a 6ft charging cord and sometimes you need a 1ft charging cord. The variety of cords in this package satisfies my needs. A 4ft long cord for my desk at work and a 1ft long cord as my car charger. The charging cords seem to be well made and durable. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Schafranek

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Systematically, each and every one of these cables died on me after mere months of use. Without exception. You get what you pay for, I suppose...
customer_reviews.author: Kat/Seb

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy any other brand anymore
customer_reviews.text: After having these for a while, I can say they are of absolutely superb construction. They fit well in my phone (LG G5), the tips are so solid I don't think I could break them if I tried and the actual braiding is excellent. My most used cord has extremely minor (less than 5 strands) fray near the USB C end but it still shows no sign of breaking any time soon. The 6 foot cable is sometimes a little weird using for data or fast charging but the others work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: TopGun4815

customer_reviews.title: Stopped fast charging my Galaxy S9 after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the cable seems good. Fast charges my Galaxy S8 perfectly fine. UPDATE 5 month review I use the 4ft cable everyday on my desk and the others just once in a while. Initially they all worked perfectly fine and the cable quality seemed very good. Then just the other day my Galaxy S9 stopped fast charging. Maybe it's my phone or the Anker Power Port or cable. I narrowed it down to the cable. I tried it with one of the other cables and it fast charges perfectly fine again. So in so many words, my cable stopped fast charging after 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great cables
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these cables constantly over the last few months and they're very durable. Never had any issues with the connection to my phone, my childrens phones or my wifes phone. I don't notice any speed differences in charging so it seems to charge at full speed. I mean, it's a cable, it either works or it doesn't, and this one does; and it is durable. So... yay? Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Deon R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with Pixel II.
customer_reviews.text: The connectors do not fit well into my Google Pixel 2. Driving in the car, the vibrations cause the cable to work its way out and stops charging, it also charges very slow. I used the 6" in cable with multiple wall adapters, and it would only increase by 3% my charge while sleeping. Works a little better for the Moto Z3, overall I would not recommend these cables. I consider it a wasted purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ScottLee

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality! assortment of lengths a huge plus
customer_reviews.text: These cables surprised me, i have bought cheap priced cables before and quality just wasnt there. These cables are very well build you can tell they have quite a bit of weight to them, the fabric wrapped cords are nice, and the fit and finish are spot on. When you pick them up you can feel like they are substantially more money. The type c fits very snug into the phone with no play. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long, poor material
customer_reviews.text: These cables look great and with a bundled solution of varying lengths I was excited to have some spares. These however, did not last very long. In short, I almost immediately noticed the USB-C male connector would no longer "click" in place for charging my phone. It seems the tabs inside are wither non exisitient or failed and crunched not too long after a few uses. This has rendered the cables absolutely useless for connecting or charging since they never stay in place. I DO NOT and CANNOT recommend these cables.
customer_reviews.author: d3rock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money - the three lengths are ideal.
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly impressed. The packaging (a nice draw-string pouch) that all four cables come in is a classy touch. And useful. The build and flexibility of these cables is first-rate, and I really like the quality feel of the cables and their connectors. The three lengths is a good idea - now I can have the right length cable be it in my car or on a nightstand without a lot of excess cable. Just having received the cables today, I have not tried them for high-speed charging with my LG V20 cell phone, but I hope they pass that test too. See other reviews here for photos of these nice cables.
customer_reviews.author: Rolls Canardly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I did not have high expectations for these cables, but I really needed a couple extra cables for the house, the office, and the car. I have been really pleased so far! I get fast charging using my wall charger, but only cable charging through my computer (but I think that's a problem with the old USB port on my computer!) The variety of lengths is really handy; the 4 foot is great for next to my bed, and the 2 foot is good for the car. My favorite feature is the attached elastic cable keeper! I always lose the velcro thingie that's supposed to bundle the cords, so having it attached to the cable itself is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne B

customer_reviews.title: Will not last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: All 4 cables ended up with loose connections on the USB-C side. I used them for a Galaxy Note 10 and S10 exclusively. The odd thing is they failed around the same time and I used the 4' cable mostly. The other lengths ended up failing a month later. The contacts inside the USB-C are of poor quality and get loose over time. My OEM and even gas station cables lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dalhia Botega

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with these cables
customer_reviews.text: I got the 4 pack and I the cables all work well and have extras that I like. Color and fabric wire cover is a nice touch as is the specialized rubber band for cable management. I was also surprised by the wee bag. I liked them enough to buy it again. The sizes are a better selection than I expected. The 6' is a lot of cable but nice to have when you want to use the phone when charging. The two 4' cables work well for general purpose data and charging. And that 1' cable is a perfect companion for an extra power battery because it packs away very small.
customer_reviews.author: A. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable with galaxy s8/s9
customer_reviews.text: Half the time with these wires I get an "incomplete connection" warning and it won't charge or connect to my car for media. I bought them for the length (1' wire in my car and the longer one for the bedside table but they're unreliable. I'm all about generics and deals but these are a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptably high failure rate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these in the last year. So far, one cable from each set has gone bad. That is a 25% failure rate. While these cables are cool looking and the other ones in the sets are still working, it's not worth spending the money to take the risk that they will fail. Better to spend the extra dollar or two and get a name brand cable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Update: these cables crapped out in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: The cables work great with my Samsung S8 and my Rhino bumper case. Another much more expensive set of cables had a too fat/wide connector head that was too large to fit through the case hole to my phone's charging port. The cables also work fine with my original Samsung quick charge adapter. They seem extremely well built and are obviously of much better quality than the original cable. Update: everyone of these cables except one has taken a proper dump. My S8 says they are only capable of low power charging now and they are unable to transfer data any longer. I have no idea...
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Graham

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product - Failed within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The cables looked actually sturdy and roughed but they are not what they looked though. First of all, the cable doesn't do fast charging at all (and yes, when connected using the fast Samsung Galaxy S9+ Fast/Adaptive charger) and the 4ft one stop working altogether within the first 6 month and the 6ft one stop working shortly after and the usage has been very little on both. I just pulled out the 2 shorts one and started to use it like 3 months ago and now none of them work. So my advice is don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working less than a year later
customer_reviews.text: When these worked, they were good. But without any visible wear, these cables all stopped working unless they were held just right. My phone charges fine with other charging cables. So the problem is definitely these cables. The vendor included a note stating they offer a lifetime warranty and to contact them if anything goes wrong. I emailed them at the address they provided and never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Raveling

customer_reviews.title: So great, I ordered 2 sets!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my boys kindle fire 10 tablets and my boyfriend’s Samsung Galaxy 9! They are much more durable than the standard black cords, the links variety was very helpful as I used the 1 foot cords at our charging station and the others in my car and other areas of my home (I liked them so much I ended up ordering two sets!). Even the gray drawstring pouch they come in is handy, since I got to I ended up using them as carrying cases for my boys’ cameras! Definitely a great product for the $!
customer_reviews.author: Boymamax2

customer_reviews.title: flops out of a nexus 6p
customer_reviews.text: These will charge a nexus 6p, but if you accidentally rest something heavy on it like a paperclip, or if an ant crawls over it or if you think harsh thoughts about it, it falls out of the phone. That's fine, I never need to move when I'm charging my phone, I like to bolt everything to concrete anyway.
customer_reviews.author: shog

customer_reviews.title: Cables worth being excited about! They just work!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cables! Tight fit, but not too tight. Works with my Slimline case without issue. The handy cable manager is more useful than anticipated. I thought it would be a pain, but I have really enjoyed it being there. Fast charge works flawlessly, as does standard charging, and third party USB power supplies. Data transfer works great as well. Will be buying another set. It's really had to get excited about charging cables, but these are really great cables!
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised....
customer_reviews.text: Because these cables were on the inexpensive side, did not really know what to expect. So far, I am pleased with the quality and the charge speed. The cables themselves are more flexible than some other braided cables I have used, which makes them easier to store, especially with the built on rubber loop witch is attached to each cable. Have charged my Pixel 2XL several times, and seems to be pretty fast at charging. I especially like the different lengths for different situations....very versatile. I will update this review after a couple months of use.....
customer_reviews.author: crwille

customer_reviews.title: Good cables with some nice bonus features.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a short cable to carry with me along with a small "power pack". I ended up ordering this set really for the 1 foot cable as the price for the full set was good. The cables are nice. They are flexible with a cloth covering. They also have a rubber retaining loop - sort of like a thick rubber band which is attached to the cable and provides a nice way to keep each one in a compact bundle when not in use. And they come with a substantial cloth bag with drawstring closure. More than I expected and I would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale on the coast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality top of the line
customer_reviews.text: These cables are excellent I was referred over to them by a co-worker who is as many would classify as an intelligent electrical engineer who said these cables were excellent a quality for the money. So I said okay I will try them, you can tell straight from the packaging that these are beautiful there sleek they are nice very durable and are going to last a long time. The red in the pictures don't give them justice it's the nice metallic red! Excellent bag for your buck and a lifetime warranty to boot as well once you do their request email. I know any future cable needs I will check their inventory first highly satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Unshownpath

customer_reviews.title: Update: A+ customer service and great product.
customer_reviews.text: Update: After my initial review I was ontacted by the seller who apologized fot my initial issues and sent me a while new set. The new set works great, not problems with connection and supports rapid charging. A+ customer service and great product!!! These are great to have around, but depending on the device sometimes I get a message stating that charger is not connected. Because they work most the time I think they are still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jiwilliams79

customer_reviews.title: Best cables I've ever bought from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cables, worth every penny! I never would have expected something so strong and durable at this price point. They charge super fast and the different lengths provide options for all my charging needs. I especially like the 1ft cord to use with my battery pack. The 6ft cord is great for the house and way better than the 3ft cord that came with my phone. Definitely recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nenno

customer_reviews.title: Wont last, save yourself time and money,  get oem! *updated review* seller sent me another set.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in May 2018. Worked as expected until a fee weeks ago. Troubleshooted and turns out 3 ot of 4 no longer fast charge my Galaxy S9+. *updated review* There is an 18 mo warranty. The seller contacted me and was more than fair and made things right. Overall, i gave it a 4 star because the product itself failed on me the first go around. The customer service though, is amazing. I have another set coming in the mail, I'm hoping that the wires I got the first time were a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Sang

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Owners Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I tried using these cables fresh out of the package on both my Note 8 and my wife's S8+ and neither would fast charge. I could get a slow charge if I wiggled the connection a bit but just plugging them in regularly produced no charge at all. As someone who has been charging cellphones daily for 10+ years now I can confidently confirm that these do not work for Samsung phones.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Knoppe

customer_reviews.title: Cable failed after 16 months.
customer_reviews.text: Had cable on nightstand to charge phone beside the best. Always fast charged my LG G6, yet the other day I started getting warning messages on my phone to clean out the USB Ports both on my phone and power fully. The cable will no longer do a fast charge, only a slow charger. Swapped cables for a spare and that fast charges. I guess a cable died already.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: The one I need is the 1ft .... about an inch short for my Inspire 2 remote :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before & it was just the right length .... this time I checked & the 1ft is an inch shorter :( It would be nice if the 1ft was 2" longer & they offered them in a package of 3 1ft cables ..... Update: Ordered another set & the 1ft cable is another 1/4" shorter :( Looks like they used to measure by red edge to red edge, now it tip to tip!!!! The oldest & longest one is about 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Great materials, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and used them often for a few months. Then, one of the cords stopped working all together. Oh well, stuff happens. Then I noticed that my phone would alert me that it was "slow charging" when plugged in. Other cords I have don't have this issue. I've tested with different outlets and chargers. Tossed them all and bought a different brand. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Decent USB-C Set For a Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: The cables are looking really good and seem to be quite sturdy. Charging and data transfer was ok so far and no complaints. The only strange thing is the rubber strap on every cable to hold it together. If you need something to hold it together - fine - I'm sure it will work, but for me it's usually easier to wrap it around my hand and to fasten lightly with a simple knot and then it's rather annoying to have this strap and you cannot remove it. But overall still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The smallest cable works fine, the others, however, don't charge at the advertised 2.4A. my phone says it's slow charging and takes about 10 minutes in airplane mode to gain 1%. Any other 2.4A cable I've used doesn't do this. They look nice and seem well constructed, but as I don't really have a use for the smallest cable I can't rate these above one star. Update: The seller contacted me right away offering a replacement or refund. Added two stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most frustrating set of cables money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: If you're super excited at the prospect of frustratingly plugging and unplugging the USB-C end over and over again in the hopes that your phone won't give you the "incomplete connection" warning, then these are the cables for you!! Are you excited at the prospect of plugging in your phone and not realizing that it's charging slower than if you were hand-cranking it??? Might you be looking for a situation that includes the slowest charging experience of your whole life???? You've landed on the right page!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic build quality, perfect lengths & fast charging works well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cables, solid plug, the storage band is nice and they fast charge properly most importantly. The braiding is very thick and actually the most sturdy I have ever seen. Side Tip: If you want to remove the little storage band don't cut it off. You can just slide/stretch the little loop around the cor over the USB-C end of the cable. Then you can use the loops for clean storage of these or other cords. Also great for cable management of computer audio & usb cables that are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sampson

customer_reviews.title: This is a good thing because the cable is thicker and cloth braided ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most durable USB C cables that I have ever purchased. Have had it for about a month now with daily use...It still holds a charge after repetive, daily, and continuous use. This is a good thing because the cable is thicker and cloth braided for durability while the tip of the USB C connector is made of metal that CANNOT/DOES NOT bend which can cause it to malfunction like all the other USB C cables again. Will definitely order more from this company when I need USB type cables of any kind. high quality and price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ha

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: The connectors are durable and lock solidly into their respective ports. The braided cord is very flexible and has a protective back cover next to the connectors. Data transfers were typical of USB 2.0, but I purchased these for charging and it does that very well. The fabric carry bag was a nice addition. Great value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: petep2112

customer_reviews.title: Slow charging everytime....
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for a few months now. Always always it sets the phone into "slow charger" mode and does not charge. You have to take the cable out and flip it over and over until you get regular charge. I ordered new ones recently and they have no issues everytime so I'm certain it is these cables.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month or two only
customer_reviews.text: So these worked great at first but after a few months, u get a notification when I try to charge my phone that says I need to use the charger that came with the phone because it's charging too slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Deniz P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great But Some Cords Failed in a Few Months
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company contacted me to apologize for the trouble with the cords and is currently shipping replacement product. They should be commended for caring to follow up with disappointed customers. The cords seem well constructed with connectors firmly attached. One cord no longer works. Another will no longer fast charge. It worked well for a few weeks then for a short time would fast charge if I unplugged and replugged until my phone said fast charge. Now it no longer fast charges no matter how many times I reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: James of Kirkwood

product_meta.title: USB Type C Cable,Covery USB C Cable 4 Pack (1x1ft,2x4ft, 1x6ft) Nylon Braided USB C to USB A Charger Cord (USB 2.0) Compatible Samsung Galaxy S10 S9 S8 Note 9 8, New MacBook, Nexus 5X,Google Pixel,LG
product_meta.description:
Production Description 

Color: Grey Size: 4 pack (1x1ft,2x4ft, 1x6ft)
Key Features: 
1.The Maximum data transfer speed of 480Mbps , is the standard of USB 2.0. Also, it enables charging up to 2.4A, and 56K resistor guarantee your device safety 
2.Type-C interface socket size is about 8.3mm × 2.5mm slim design. 
Q&A: 
1. how long are these?
4pack type-c cables:1x1ft,2x4ft, 1x6ft. And 1ft = 0.3m, 4ft= 1.2m, 6ft=1.8m.
2.What's the maximum Amp? 
Its maximum Amp is 3 Amp. and it have 56K resistor guarantee. 
3.Will this cord support fast speed charge? 
Yes, the cables could support fast speed charge. But it generally needs to meet 2 conditions. a, The output power of Power adapter above 2000 mA can support fast charge (now its standard is 2700mA for fast speed charge); b, It depends on if Customer’s cell phone can support fast speed charge.
4.Do the cords work for the zte zmax pro z981? 
Yes, it can work for the zte zmax pro z981. Also it can work with following devices: Samsung Galaxy S8(2017), Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus/S8+, 
LG G6,G5,V20, LG Nexus 5X , Huawei P9/P9 Plus, Huawei P10/P10 Plus, Huawei Mate 9, 
Google Nexus 5X ,Nexus 6P, Google Pixel, Google Chromebook Pixel, 
Lumia 950, Lumia 950XL,OnePlus 2,3,3T, ZTE Axon 7, Moto Z2 play, 
HTC 10, Nokia N1,Asus Zen AiO,Lenovo Zuk Z1,Nintendo Switch, 
2015 Apple new MacBook with 12" Retina Display and Other Type-c devices
feature_bullets: After-Sale Service: For 18 months after the date of purchase, we take care of all quality-related issues. Pls contact us at the first time if you got the defective item.

Fast Charging Condition:1.The power adapter must be a product of QC2.0，also called the power adapter QC2.0 protocol, it will output 9V voltage, transmitted to the mobile phone through the usb cable.2.the phone must support fast charging,just meet 2 condition,can support fast charging.

Feature: 1. The Maximum data transfer speed of 480Mbps , is the standard of USB 2.0 and it also have 56k ohm resistor. 2.Type-C interface socket size is about 8.3mm × 2.5mm slim design. 3. Support from both sides can be inserted "positive and negative insert" function, can withstand 10,000 times repeatedly plug. 4. Charging and Transmission Two in One.

Nylon Braided,Extreme Durability: High-quality nylon braided thread is tightly woven. With a tested 10000+ bend lifespan,the cables is more durable,wear-resistant and pull-resistant. Even the cables is easy to sort out,not to knot or tangle.

Compatible With:Work with the new USB Type-C devices such as Samsung Galaxy S10/S9/S8, Samsung Galaxy S8, Note 9 8, Plus/S8+, LG G6,G5,V20, LG Nexus 5X , Huawei P9/P9 Plus, Huawei P10/P10 Plus, Huawei Mate 9, Mate 10 Pro, Google Nexus 5X ,Nexus 6P, Google Pixel, Google Chromebook Pixel, Lumia 950, Lumia 950XL, OnePlus 2,3,3T, ZTE Axon 7, Moto Z2 play, HTC 10, Nokia N1, Asus Zen AiO, Lenovo Zuk Z1, 2015 Apple new MacBook with 12" Retina Display and other usb type c cable device.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars4,611 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
